thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 21 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Kabul Intercontinental Hotel siege ends, all gunmen killed: government

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Kabul Intercontinental Hotel siege ends, all gunmen killed: government
text:
KABUL (Reuters) - Afghan Special Forces ended an overnight siege at Kabulâ€™s Intercontinental Hotel on Sunday, killing the last surviving attacker, said Interior Ministry spokesman Najib Danish.
Two other gunmen, who stormed the hotel and took hostages, were killed the previous night.
Danish said at least five other people had been killed and six wounded, a lower casualty total than earlier feared, while 153 people, including 41 foreigners had been evacuated.
Reporting by James McKenzie; Editing by Michael Perry
